info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 25 at 3:50PM MST until August 25 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona...
* Until 445 PM MST.
* At 350 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 9 miles south of Freeman to 7 miles southeast of Chui-Chu to near Coolidge Airport, moving northwest at 25 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Trained weather spotters.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 174 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 145 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 155.
Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Maricopa, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, San Tan Valley, Coolidge Airport, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Arizola, San Tan Mountain Park, and Randolph.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 4:45 PM MST. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 4:45 PM MST. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:45 PM MST. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:45 PM MST. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
